mapper.select: SELECT story_year, story_logo_img_path, story_title, story_description, story_img_path FROM story ORDER BY story_year
SELECT history_img_path, history_ice_name FROM history_flavor WHERE history_year = #{historyYear} ORDER BY history_year, history_month

SELECT h.history_img_path, h.history_ice_name FROM history_flavor_theme hft JOIN history_flavor h ON hft.history_ice_id = h.history_ice_id JOIN theme t ON hft.theme_id = t.theme_id WHERE t.theme_id = #{themeId} ORDER BY h.history_year, h.history_month
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_description, campaign_summary, campaign_img_path, campaign_subtitle FROM campaign ORDER BY campaign_id

SELECT c.campaign_id, c.campaign_name, cai.campaign_activity_title, cai.campaign_activity_ym, cai.campaign_activity_description, cai.campaign_activity_img_path FROM campaign_activity_info cai JOIN campaign c ON c.campaign_id = cai.campaign_id ORDER BY c.campaign_id, cai.campaign_activity_ym
